document_data.name: ''Shadowfell gloves''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Shadowfell gloves''''' were a variety of [[magic item|magical]] gloves woven from [[Shadowfell]] thread.
document_data.Powers: Once per day, the wielder of ''shadowfell gloves'' could cause a harmful [[arcane magic|arcane]] [[spell]] they cast to deal that harm through [[necromancy|necrotic energy]].The text is unclear on what it means by "Shadowfell thread." This could be thread infused with Shadowfell energy or it could be thread originating from the Shadowfell.
document_data.Reputation: ''Shadowfell gloves'' were highly prized by [[warlock]]s and [[wizard]]s alike.
